content: The mouse is afraid of the cat, the cat is afraid of the dog, the dog is afraid of my brother, my brother is afraid of my aunt, and my aunt is afraid of the mouse.
translations: ita:Il topo ha paura del gatto, il gatto ha paura del cane, il cane ha paura di mio fratello, mio fratello ha paura di mia z
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by rul (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
